name: export-controls
description: Use when identifying export control and sanctions laws that affect software distribution and encryption. Covers US EAR and ITAR, EU Dual-Use Regulation, Wassenaar Arrangement, OFAC sanctions, and encryption export rules that apply to software products distributed internationally.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
